## ColorUtils.getHexFromRgb() function

Encodes RGB all color channels in single number with format 0xRRGGBB.

All input channels should be in &lt;<!-- -->0, 1<!-- -->&gt; range (inclusively). See also \[\[getHexFromRgba\]\] for more information about \[\[THREE.Color\]\] compatibility.

 This method is fully compatible with THREE.js color encoding, so you may pass this value directly to THREE.Color c-tor.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
function getHexFromRgb(r: number, g: number, b: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  r | number |  |
|  g | number |  |
|  b | number |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

number
